response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. This product holds immense worth to me, reflecting years of dedication and craftsmanship. I am confident it will bring equal or greater value to you.

To extend this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $850,000. This is a significant discount from its true value, which I am more than willing to negotiate further if you express interest.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you decide to proceed, I would be honored to facilitate the transaction and ensure a smooth process. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
